title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Large-Scale Geography Introduction Project Course Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain core geography theories (climate, topography, population distribution) with over 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment.
Learners can propose practical solutions applying geographical principles to address community issues through PBL team projects.
Learners can perform peer assessments and provide feedback three or more times using a smartphone-based LMS (Learning Management System).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
